Column1: Does your software allow data to be imported and exported using open data formats?*e.g. GIF, SVG, HTML, XML, tar, zip, CSV, JSON, NetCDF, or domain specific ones
Column3: Our application accepts data in the form of a PDF, Docx and URL which are both open formats. It also accepts data in the form of docx which is a Microsoft domain-specific format. It exports data in the apkg format which is an Anki Flashcard domain-specific format (.apkg).
